Question: This person's great-grandmother, Grace Strain, was born in Creeslough, County Donegal, Ireland in 1865.
Hints: In 2004, this person was awarded the AFI Life Achievement Award by the Board of Directors of the American Film Institute.
Required to perform on the violin, this person went through two months of intense training, four to six hours a day.
This person lived with actor John Cazale for three years until his death in March 1978.
